/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the warm glow of a sunrise or sunset. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with a variety of buildings, stretches out into the distance, flanked by trees that add a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars of various colors are scattered along the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the soft light. Streetlights stand sentinel along the sidewalk, their presence adding a sense of order and structure to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, its vast expanse only interrupted by the tops of the buildings. The sun, though not directly visible, makes its presence known through the hazy orange tint that permeates the image, casting long shadows and highlighting the hustle and bustle of city life.
